on time.translation[0].definitions[0].de: at the correct time or the time that was arranged
on time.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Jack was worried about whether he’d be able to get there on time.
The plane arrived right on time.
on time.translation[0].definitions[0].no: On time means ‘at the correct or agreed time’
In time means ‘early enough for something or to do something’
He arrived in time for supper
